about_the_game:
A Digital Artbook featuring artwork and the original soundtrack of Fate/Samurai Remnant.
You can access the content from the Title Screen once you apply this DLC.

Contains more than 180 pieces of visual materials such as character designs and reference sheets, allowing you to take a closer look at the game's universe. The soundtrack features all 89 in-game tracks, including the theme song.

Note:
Some of the materials featured in the content are closely tied to important story elements. Please keep that in mind before viewing the content.
The Digital Deluxe Edition that includes this content is also available for purchase. Please avoid making redundant purchases.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Suicide, Prostitution Reference

short_description: Unravel the dazzling, supernatural wonders of Edo. A Digital Artbook featuring artwork and the original soundtrack of Fate/Samurai Remnant.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
